1: byed dang skrod pa nyid//sde rengs byed dang mngon spyod dang//ji ltar rigs par rnal 'byor ma'i//bskyed dang gnas dang phyed rgyu dang//don byed ye shes rnam shes dang//lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba 'o//
2: he ru ka ni skyed pa'i rgyu//dang por gcig ni bsgom par bya//rdo rje snying po snying rje che//dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing//dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur//de yongs shes pas grol
3: ba yin//dngos po med par yongs shes pas//dngos po sgom 'gyur shes rab can//dngos po med pa yongs shes pas//de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya//lus la ye shes chen po gnas//rtog
4: pa thams cad yang dag sbangs//dngos po kun la khyab pa po//lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa 'o//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags//bcom ldan
5: 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rtsa rnams ni/ sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'dzag pa'o//de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa rnam
6: pa gsum ni gtso bo ste/ /rkyang ma dang/ ro ma dang/ kun 'dar ma'o//rkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis//thabs kyis ro ma yang dag gnas//kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas su//gzung dang 'dzin pa
7: rnam par spangs//rkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste//ro ma de bzhin khrag 'bab cing//shes rab zla ba 'bab bshad pa//de ni kun 'dar ma rab grags//mi phyed ma dang phra gzugs ma dang rtse ba
8: ma dang/ g.yon pa ma dang thung du ma dang/ ru s+bal skyes ma dang sgom pa ma dang/ dbang ma dang skyon ma dang 'jug ma dang ma mo dang/ bsil sbyin ma dang tsha ba ma dang/ rkyang ma dang kun 'dar ma dang ro ma
